value:
Prince Alfonse is amazing. I could
learn a lot from him. His mannerisms
and battle etiquette are so polished.

I was raised in the Deeprealms, so
there is much about the world I still
do not know.$k$pThat's not to say my education was
lacking. But if in your eyes I leave
something to be desired, do tell me.

Please leave the patrols to me. You
needn't hesitate to assign me tasks
just because I'm a prince.$k$pWe are all of the same standing here.
Everyone is a fellow soldier.

Would you allow me to watch your
summoning ceremony up close? I
have never seen such a skill before.$k$pIt's quite amazing. If I had a power like
that, then I...

I was just reading a book in the
Order's library, when I—$k$pWhat? I'm not allowed in the library?!
M-my apologies! How could I have
made such a mistake?!

I come with a fond greeting from
$Nf. This
castle looks entertaining...$k$pWould you mind if I visited again?
I've grown so much so suddenly!

I'm an even greater help to the
team.
I'm still too young, it seems...

Many thanks for this! I'll make
good use of it.

It's good to meet you. I'm Siegbert.
Prince Xander of Nohr is my father,
so as a future king, I'll give it my all.

Well met, $Nu.
Checking in while on patrol, are you?
There's nothing to report here.$k$pHuh? You're not on patrol, but you're
here to chat? Well, I must admit... I do
look forward to talking with you.$k$pBack home, most are too aware that
I'm the future king of Nohr to engage
me with anything but pleasantries.$k$pBut I'm glad people are more open to
approaching me here.$k$pIt's not that I dislike my home—that's
not it at all. However, here I can be
honest and I can truly express myself.$k$pYou've become important to me, in a
way that exceeds friendship. I raise
my sword for you, my compatriot.
はっ！
せいっ！
うあっ！
耐えてみせる…！
Be ready!
No holding back!
Kneel before me!
I will end this!
I'm sorry...Father...
Heehee
Everything in this kingdom is so...beautiful. So much abundance!
I cannot shirk my studies if I wish to become a great king.
I'm awfully curious about the Order of Heroes... Tell me, are the regulations very strict?
I'd like to talk with as many people from this world as I can.
I must admit, I'm a little jealous of that divine weapon you carry...
When will the day come that I finally swing Siegfried with my own hand?
The burden of living up to my father has weighed on my mind for some time. I wish to be as great a prince as he, so you will have my support until this war is over.
Yes.
I'm Siegbert.
Let's do this together.
